College_Summary: Rajkiya Engineering College, Azamgarh formerly known as Manyawar Kansi Ram Engineering College of Information Technology (MKECIT) is a constituent college of Uttar Pradesh Technical University, Lucknow which the Government of Uttar Pradesh manages. In the year 2010 - 11, the program offered by the college was Bachelor of Technology in three disciplines Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, and Civil Engineering. Rajkiya Engineering College, Azamgarh’s seat intake for each discipline is 60.

MP) in order to set up professional and technical institutes to bring quality education to the common people. College_Name: Dewan V.S Group of Institutions, Bhopal
College_Summary: Dewan V.S. Group of Institutions (DVSGI) was established in the year 1997. The institution is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and the Ministry of HRD. The institutes are affiliated with Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut, and Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. Dewan V.S. Group of Institutions has 7 institutes offering courses in the fields of management, engineering, law, and education. Some of the UG courses offered at DVSGI are B.Tech., BBA, BCA, B.Sc. (HHA), BHMCT, B.A.LL.B., B.Com. and PG courses offered are MCA, MBA, PGDM, and LL.M. The institute has an NAAC A++ grade.

College_Name: Techno Institute of Management Sciences, Lucknow
College_Summary: Techno Institute of Management Sciences, established in 2010, is a private institute approved by AICTE. The institute offers 11 UG and PG courses in the disciplines of Management, Science, Commerce and Journalism & Mass Communication. The flagship course of TIMS is their 2 year full time MBA course across 5 specializations. Other popular courses of the college include BBA, BCA, B.Ed, B.Sc in two specializations, BAJMC and MAJMC courses. Apart from that, TIMS offers B.COM, B.COM (Hons) and M.COM degree programs. For admission in the MBA course at Techno Institute of Management Sciences, candidates must obtain valid scores in CAT/MAT/XAT. To be eligible for the B.Ed course, a valid score in UP B.Ed Entrance Examination is required. Admission to the other courses at TIMS are finalised based on the candidate’s performance in the last qualifying examination.

The institute offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the field of engineering and architecture. Admissions at GL Bajaj Group of Institutions Mathura to these courses are conducted every year.

College_Name: Amity School of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Amity School of Engineering and Technology (ASET) was established in 2003 as a part of Amity University. The institute is approved by UGC and AICTE. It is accredited by NAAC with an 'A+' grade and holds the membership of AIU. The engineering programs of Amity University are listed under The Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET). Amity School of Engineering and Technology is located in E Block of Amity University Noida. The college offers 58+ academic programs, out of which there are 27 B.Tech courses. Amity School of Engineering and Technology offers UG, PG, Integrated and Ph.D. courses. The institute is spread over an area of 1000 acres. It has more than 280 faculty members, 100 support staff and 5200+ students. There are 118 laboratories in Amity School of Engineering and Technology. Admission to the various courses offered at ASET Noida is done based on merit scored in Class XII and entrance exam scores.

Future College provides the best and state-of-the-art tech facilities to nurture the students into industrial leaders. The institute provides several Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in a variety of fields, including B.Tech, BBA, B.Sc, BCA, MBA, MCA, PGDM, etc. Admission to the courses offered will be done either based on the candidate's performance in entrance exams or based on their performance in the previous qualifying examination. The placement cell of Future Group of Institutions is designed to satisfy the continually changing demands of recruiters while also providing students with the finest possibilities to begin their careers.

The college has separate Hostel accommodation for boy and girl’s students.

Sri Sharda Group of Institutions, Lucknow
College_Summary: Sri Sharda Group of Institutions is a Lucknow based AICTE approved and AKTU affiliated private institution which came into existence in 2011. The institute was established with an aim to offer best quality education in the field of Commerce and Management, has a NEP driven curriculum and offers 7 Undergraduate, 1 Postgraduate, 1 Diploma courses along with 10 MOOC courses to students in various specializations. And admission to these courses is granted to students based on marks obtained by them in last year's qualifying exam. Also the location of college gives it an added advantage as it’s only 25 km away from Lucknow airport. Also for the institution's significant contribution in the education sector it has been awarded as the Best Management College in UP by Praxis Media in 2017 and as a Best B-School of Uttar Pradesh by Bharat Samachar in 2019.

College_Name: Veer Kunwar Institute of Technology- [VKIT], Bijnor
College_Summary: Veer Kunwar Institute of Technology is managed by the Kunwar Kali Education Trust. It was established in the year 2008. The institute is affiliated to the Uttar Pradesh Technical University (Uttar Pradesh) and approved by the AICTE. The institute offers with several programs in the field of management studies & technology to the students. The institute has state of art infrastructure provided with modern facilities at the campus. The faculty of the institute is experienced and qualified in their respective field & imparts with quality of education to the students.

College_Name: Dayanand Dinanath Group of Institutions - [DDGI], Kanpur
College_Summary: The main motto of this college is to be ranked in between the top colleges in general quality and in thorough research and to be countrywide as well as worldwide recognized for their empirical learning initiatives which develop leaders who do extremely well in creative pioneering solutions to difficult problems throughout people, using high level technology as an enabler. The work of the college is to be at the front position of the growth of Management and Engineering & Technology competencies throughout outstanding research, innovating experimental learning and planned outreach methods.

Abhay Memorial Trust Group of Institutions, Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh
College_Summary: Situated in one of the oldest historical cities of India, Abhay Memorial Trust Group of Institutions is a Prayagraj based leading private college which came into existence in 2010 and offers MBA and Diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering and Business Administration. The institution is affiliated to Uttar Pradesh State Board of Technical Education, Lucknow and approved by AICTE. Admission to college’s courses are granted based on intermediate or Graduation scores. In a recent survey conducted by Times of India, AMTGI was ranked as one of top 10 colleges of UP and 39 all over India in terms of placement records. Also, the prime location of college gives it many advantages as it is located 15 km far away from Civil Lines which is also called Heart of the City and people from cities like Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata and Lucknow can easily reach out to college through air route. Last but not the least, the college has a strength of 5000 students and 20+ expert faculties to teach them.

Tirupati College of Engineering and Pharmacy, Lucknow
College_Summary: Tirupati College of Engineering (Engineering & Pharmacy) at Mohanlalganj, Lucknow is one among the Top Private Institute in Uttar Pradesh (Under Diploma Category). The institute provides 4 diploma courses in the engineering discipline, 1 diploma course and 1 Bachelor course in Pharmacy discipline: D. Pharm. and B. Pharm. The Admissions are provided based on performance in the Entrance Examinations (JEECUP and CUET), which is conducted by Uttar Pradesh State Government and NTA respectively. Industrial Giants of various Sectors like Accenture, TCS, Bose, Hyundai, and Axis Bank, etc. visit the college for their campus drive to recruit the eligible students.
